title: Sri Lanka stocks up as foreign investors buy Keells
content: Aug 15 (Reuters) – The Sri Lankan stock market rose on Wednesday for the second straight session on foreign strategic buying in market heavyweight John Keells Holdings amid a sharp decline in prices across-the-board this year.
